Description:
Tbot Systems is looking for a Sales Manager to join our team. In this role, you will be responsible for driving sales revenue and customer acquisition. You will manage a team of sales professionals and work closely with our clients to understand their business needs and provide them with tailored solutions. As a Sales Manager, you will play a crucial role in contributing to the company's growth and success. Tbot Techno Systems is an IT Solutions and Services company that offers a comprehensive range of services and products including IT hardware, networking, peripherals, software, and infrastructure solutions. Our partnerships with leading IT OEMs enable us to provide customized IT solutions to businesses across various industries.Develop and implement a sales strategy to achieve revenue targets
Manage a team of sales professionals and provide mentoring, coaching, and feedback
Build and maintain relationships with existing and potential customers
Conduct market research to identify new business opportunities and stay abreast of market trends
Prepare proposals, negotiate contracts, and close deals
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure seamless delivery of services
Maintain accurate records of sales activities and report on sales performance metrics.Job Details
